features: UHF NARROW BAND: These cordless microphones for singing feature UHF audio transmission for unsurpassed performance w/ high signal over noise ratio for clear, noise, distortion free, crisp vocal & excellent sound reproduction unlike low-grade VHF unit

ULTRA-WIDE FREQUENCY: This wireless handheld microphone system features digital display w/ selectable mic frequency & broad audio response range w/ low distortion. Enjoy cordless singing to karaoke music & mobility for energetic on-stage performance

AUDIO RECEIVER: The Pyle wireless microphone system includes a plug-in audio adapter receiver with ¼” (6. 3mm) jack. Features integrated antenna for extended wireless range. It directly connects to amplifiers, stereos, audio processors, and DJ mixer

BATTERY OPERATED: The wireless professional microphone features 2 AA battery operated design while the receiver has a 3. 7V rechargeable battery. Used for karaoke, classroom, office/business applications. Perfect for public audio & studio performances

ACOUSTIC POP FILTER: Features built-in acoustic pop filter which is a noise protection filter for microphones and an ON/OFF switch for easy control. Made of heavy duty construction w/ steel mesh grill and Aluminum alloy metal that ensures its longevity
body.description: Features: Pro Audio Microphone System Handheld Wireless Mic & Receiver Adapter UHF Narrow Band Audio Transmitter Portable Battery-Operated Design Mic Adapter with Built-in Rechargeable Battery Digital Display with Selectable Mic Frequency Integrated Antenna for Extended Wireless Range Simple Plug-and-Play Operation Includes Plug-in Audio Adapter Receiver Audio Receiver with 1/4'' -inch (6. 3mm) Jack Built-in Acoustic Pop Filter Integrated Low Noise Circuitry Ultra-Wide Frequency Response Noise-Eliminating SMT Technology Crisp Audio Clarity for Vocals & Singing LED Indicator Light Power ON/OFF Switch Rugged & Durable Mic Construction with Steel Mesh Grill Perfect for Professional Audio Stage & Studio Performances Directly Connects to Amplifiers, Stereos, Audio Processors, DJ Mixers Used for Home Karaoke, Classroom, Office & Business Applications What’s In The Box: Wireless Handheld Microphone Mic Transmitter Receiver USB Charge Cable Audio Receiver Adaptor, 6. 35mm-to-3. 5mm Technical Specs: Wireless Operation: UHF Band Transmitter Selectable Frequency Mic Design: 16 Channel Microphone Element/Type: Dynamic Pickup/Polar Pattern: Uni-Directional Wireless Operating Range: Up to 165'+ ft. Receiver Connector Type: 1/4'' -inch (6. 3mm) Audio Stability: 50PPM Receiving Sensitivity: S/N Ratio: 96dB Distortion: Modulation Mode: FM Output Power: 10mW Harmonic Radiation: Receiver Working Current: Mic Construction Material: Aluminum Metal Alloy Receiver Rechargeable Battery: 3. 7V Li-iOn, 450mAh - 1. 665Wh - 9g Power Supply: USB, DC 5V Battery Operated Microphone, Requires (2) x 'AA’ (Not Included) Handheld Mic Size (L x W x H): 10. 0'' x 2. 0'' x 2. 0’’ -inches Mic Receiver Size (L x W x H): 3. 74'' x 1. 2'’ x 1. 2'' -inches

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pyle Portable UHF Wireless Microphone System | Handheld Wireless Mic and Receiver Adapter The Pyle professional audio microphone system delivers clear, noise-free, wireless transmission and excellent sound reproduction. The battery operated handheld dynamic unidirectional cordless microphone transmitter set with adapter receiver are easy-to-setup and easy-to-operate. The wireless microphone system by Pyle will provide you with the performance you've been looking for. Whether used for work or play, this dual cordless microphone system is easy to setup, easy to use, and best of all, will give you an amazing high-quality audio experience. Enjoy hassle-free and reliable wireless sound transmission with today’s latest system technology with this all-in-one package.

Professional Battery Operated Handheld Dynamic Unidirectional Cordless Microphone Transmitter Set with Adapter Receiver Pyle PDWMU105 Pro Audio Wireless Microphone System for PA Karaoke DJ Party and Events Unidirectional cordless microphone system has an excellent sound production for vocals or speech and perfect for just about any event on stage, in the office or even at home. Comes with everything you need to perform including 1 wireless handheld microphone, transmitter receiver microphone, USB charge cable, and an audio receiver adaptor. Enjoy cordless singing to karaoke music and mobility for energetic on stage perfomance with this handheld wireless microphone system. No matter what you use it for, the wireless microphone system by Pyle will take your sound and style to the next level. Technical Specifications Harmonic Radiation: <50 dbc Mic Construction Material: Aluminum Metal Alloy Wireless Operating Range: up to 165'+ ft. Selectable Frequency Mic Design: 16 Channel Handheld Mic Size (LWH): 10.0'' X 2.0'' X 2.0’’ Mic Receiver Size (LWH): 3.74'' X 1.2'’ x 1.2''

This wireless handheld Microphone system features digital display with selectable microphone frequency and broad audio response range with low distortion. The unidirectional cordless microphone features integrated antenna for extended wireless range. It directly connects to amplifiers, stereos, audio processors, and DJ mixer. This portable wireless microphone system perfect used for karaoke, classroom, office/business applications. Perfect for Public audio and studio performances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sounds great! Easy to connect.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for use in my escape room. I use it with an amplifier to speak with guests through a series of speakers. I previously had a wired microphone which worked fine, but it was annoying not being able to get up and walk around. This wireless mic really did the trick. I was skeptical at first about the quality but it's actually fantastic. And it's quite a bit louder than my previous mic and I had to turn down the volume on my amp. It connects super easy, just turn on the receiver and then turn on the mic. and it connects super fast. I've been able to walk out of the room and down the hall and it still worked which is also awesome. There are a few things that are odd about it, at least for my use. The mic itself takes 2 AA batteries, which are easy to change. The receiver has a rechargeable battery which is great, but there is no LED that lights up when it is charging and I wish there were. You just have to assume it is charging. The LED on the receiver is GREEN when it turns on and is NOT connected, and turns RED when it is connected. That seems backwards to me, but once you figure it out it's fine. There is no way to mute the mic once it is on and connected. It's either on or off. At first I thought this was going to be a problem but it really isn't for 2 reasons. First the mic is directional. I can set it down with the top pointed away from me and it doesn't pick up any sound. You do need to remember this when using it and speak into it directly. The second reason is that because it connects to the receiver almost instantly i can just turn the mic off when i'm done talking and then when I need to speak again I just pick it up and flip it on and it instantly connects and is ready.The mic has a small display that shows battery life, which seems to be pretty good, as well as the channel it is connected to. You can change the default channel so I can, in theory, get a second mic and use it in the same room without interference. I haven't tried that but it should work.Overall this is an awesome mic for the price despite a few of the quirks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement microphone for Pyle Public Address System!
reviews.reviewText: The microphone with our Pyle public address system has seen better days in the elementary school. Unfortunately could not locate an exact replacement unit but this all metal professional microphone and receiver kit is a major upgrade! Really beefy and well made. Plugs into the auxiliary port and works well. Easy to recommend this for a wireless device or as a replacement for an existing device that has failed. We will see if the kids can destroy this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cool mic
reviews.reviewText: It feels profesional I still can’t get the correct frequency without that noise that you get when you get to close to the speaker but it works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent wireless mic. But you'd do better to get the PDMU103 (similar but better) model.
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent quality bargain UHF wireless mic for light duty use. It has a good feel, the transmitted sound is excellent for speech and decent for voice singing. It's easy to use. It automatically chooses a free channel, in the face of interference on a given channel. Overall, for the price, a reasonable item.BUT: If you need a system you can RELY on for use over over numbers of hours, DO NOT BUY THIS, the Pyle PDWMU105. Insetad, buy the (slightly more expensive) PDWMU103, also sold here on Amazon.The two look alike. The microphones for each look identical externally (tho are not interhcangeable).But this item, PDWMU103, has a soldered-in NON replaceable lithium rechargeable battery in its receiver! If the reciever's battery goes dead, YOU ARE OUT OF LUCK. You CAN NOT drop in a new battery to make the show go on. WORSE, this item's battery is pretty small, and relatively low capacity (I know... I opened it up to look at the battery). In contrast, the otherwise near identical PDWMU105's receiver uses a BIG 18650 lithium ion cell, the single most common kind of replaceable LiIon cell. It has a huge capacity, and you can trivially have a spare, charged up, handy, and if need be drop it into the receiver on the PDWMU105's receiver with no need for tools to do so, in a matter of seconds, literally.The two systems are otherwise the same, and have essentially the same electronics.But the PDWMU103 costs a bit more than the PDWMU105. $20 more, last time I checked. But... it's WELL WORTH IT for near all applications, however, I'd say.PDMU103 on Amazon:https://www.amazon.com/Pyle-Kit-Portable-Professional-Unidirectional-Transmitter/dp/B08XDN5Y4W/ref=sr_1_1?crid=36O6NRTRIP5O5&keywords=PDWMU103&qid=1671776553&s=electronics&sprefix=pdwmu103%2Celectronics%2C117&sr=1-1

reviews.reviewText: It’s a good product and good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WAY TOO LOUD! WILL NOT TURN DOWN
reviews.reviewText: Followed all directions on pamphlet. Speaker only screeched at super high decibel. Tried over and over to get it to work. Had to have the speaker outside and the microphone inside due to the high decibel level. Microphone would not turn down. Using with a blue tooth speaker. Called tech support and got zero help. On the phone with someone who put me on hold, read the directions to me that I already told him did not work. Missed the return window hoping I could get someone from tech support to provide help. Now I'm stuck with a microphone that does not work and tech support that is not helpful AT ALL!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good value for the money
reviews.reviewText: A very good sounding wireless microphone for such little cash. It does not drift or cut out. Works really well for live sound and video. However the battery in the receiver portion of the microphone does not hold a really big charge. I am not sure but an external power-source could possibly be added when doing longer gigs. Any cell 5 volt cell phone power source will do such as an external batter backup or wall charger. The handheld microphone shell is made of a metal alloy and not cheap plastic. Happy with the Purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No tiene mucho alcance,pero es bueno

Ahi está la foto y el Pyle en plena acción, la bateria del receptor duró un evento de mas de 6 horas, las baterías del micrófono quedaron con toda la carga.Nunca se corto la señal, sonido Claro y sobretodo acabados muy finos, viene en aluminio, indicador de carga y multifrecuencias.Yo? Muy satisfecho, lo recomiendo!
